dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.sender_name: Amy & Kids Co. Family Child Care

works.description:
Sections of my Child Care Nutrition page 

have been copied and pasted word-for-word on the other site. Sometimes a  

sentence has been deleted and other text added, but much of the page came 

from my website.

This entire paragraph is from my website except they deleted the last 5  
words from my paragraph: "Our weekly menus are carefully planned to follow
 
child care nutrition guidelines at every meal. Each menu is designed to  
provide a wide variety of nutritious foods that are different in color,  
shape, size and texture. All of our child care menus include foods that
are  
new or different, the children's favorites, culturally diverse, and  
seasonally appropriate. Menus are rotated on a six-week basis to provide  

the children with a balance of variety and familiarity. Menus are adapted 

to incorporate fresh in-season produce and special foods that fit our  
current curriculum. Food Program forms are kept on file."
